html: (2 Nephi 7:6)."I gave … my cheeks to them that plucked off the hair." Plucking the hair of a man's face or beard was looked upon as a shameful way of degrading him. (See 2 Samuel 10:1-4.) While our present New Testament makes no specific mention of this occurring to Christ, it is descriptive of the rude way in which He was treated by the Jews and the Romans during His final hours.
